title: Motley Fool Money: 04.17.2009
description: eBay shows Skype the door. Google shows signs of slowing. And financial stocks show their better side. On this week’s Motley Fool Money we tackle those topics, offer a few stock ideas, share a few beefs, and question the wisdom of one company’s name.
content:encoded: eBay shows Skype the door. Google shows signs of slowing. And financial stocks show their better side. On this week’s Motley Fool Money we tackle those topics, offer a few stock ideas, share a few beefs, and question the wisdom of one company’s name.
